B:

options.A: The media coverage is a huge problem. The media also has no moral compass. They will have a story after the fact that is a lie. There are plenty of other countries with gun restrictions, and it has nothing to do with guns. These are the guys who say, â€œI donâ€™t want guns,â€ then they shoot up a school. That is the problem. To put that aside, I think itâ€™s ridiculous that the United States of America is still fighting a war in Afghanistan.
options.B: I think it's an actual issue in the US, but a hard one to debate, guns are a way for self-defense too.
